questions.question_text:
You have an external facing web server running in the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) London region. You are notified that customers in North America and
Australia are facing high latency while connecting to your web server.
Which services are available on OCI that can help you get current latency statistics to your web server from these markets?

choices.A: Use DNS Zone Management service to check latency over that connection
choices.B: Setup an IPsec VPN with customers in those markets and check latency over that connection
choices.C: Use the Internet Intelligence tool. Run tests using the web server's public IP address review traceroute details from different vantage points
choices.D: Setup a FastConnect with customers in those markets and check latency over that connection

questions.question_text: Which statement is true regarding Autonomous Transaction Processing (ATP)?

choices.A: A database name cannot be used concurrently for both an Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW) and an ATP database
choices.B: After terminating a database, the database name is available for immediate reuse
choices.C: A maximum of 8 cores can be enabled for an ATP database
choices.D: A maximum of 2 TB of storage can be enabled for an ATP database

questions.question_text: You have been tasked with creating one virtual cloud network (VCN) each for two line of business (LOB) applications. LOB A and LOB B will need to communicate with each other. To ensure that you can utilize VCN peering, which network CIDR ranges should be used?

comments.content:
nope, c is wrong: 10.0 are overlaping. 
A is correct.

discussion.content: Answer is A. No IP overlapping
